Pet Manager Waters:
Here, try this delicious new Wolf food. With this, even a Turek War Hound will go down in one bite! And here are Steel Teeth -- an expert Dwarven knife sharpener spent weeks making these! Ah, and see these new hatchling items! Look around -- a good pet owner always comes to the Dion Pet Center firs!
Listen to instructions about how to raise a pet.
Purchase pet items.
Exchange pet equipment for higher-grade one.
Exchange the hatchling equipment with the strider equipment.
Evolve pet.
Exchange the pet trade ticket with a pet.
Sell your items.
See the lord and get the tax rate information.
